snippet: An unveiling ceremony for a portrait of the former Providence mayor and felon Buddy Cianci came to an abrupt end Thursday when Mr. Cianci was overcome by heat.
abstract: Former Providence, RI, Mayor Buddy Cianci is overcome by heat at unveiling ceremony for his portrait; Cianci is city's longest-serving mayor, although he was forced from office twice and served federal prison term for racketeering conspiracy beginning in 2002.
lead_paragraph: An unveiling ceremony for a portrait of the former Providence mayor and felon Buddy Cianci came to an abrupt end Thursday when Mr. Cianci was overcome by heat.

headline.main: Rhode Island: Former Mayor Takes Ill at Unveiling of His Portrait
headline.print_headline: Rhode Island: Ex-mayor Takes Ill at Unveiling of His Portrait
